channel.title: Hello, I'm Shantnu from PySkool
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I have been lurking here for a few weeks now.
I'm planning on writing a book on Python web apps, for complete beginners. At the moment, I just have a few articles, which I'm expanding.
As a challenge, I wrote a Python tutorial in the form of an interactive story, [The Moo-Inator.][1]
I'm not sure if I need to make the site more "serious" for the corporate types.
I'm based in South East England.
Regards, Shantnu
[1]: http://pyskool.com/mootorial/

item.title: Hello, I'm Shantnu from PySkool
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I have been lurking here for a few weeks now.

I’m planning on writing a book on Python web apps, for complete beginners. At the moment, I just have a few articles, which I’m expanding.

As a challenge, I wrote a Python tutorial in the form of an interactive story, The Moo-Inator.

I’m not sure if I need to make the site more “serious” for the corporate types.

I’m based in South East England.

Regards,
Shantnu
